page.title: 18Industry at Newmillerdam
page.content: Our school is nearly l.5 miles from the northern boundary of the area we were to survey. Every day we noticed perhaps 20 or 30 vans and lorries going past school. Sometimes even more went past on specially designed transporters. There seems to be nothing unusual about lorries going along a busy main road but these lorries all tend to be white or light grey or light blue; have no lettering on them, and usually only consist of the chassis and cab. Finally all the lorries and vans are produced by Mercedes Benz. On our land use survey we discovered that just off the A6l road and lKm south of Newmillerdam and surrounded by woods is the regional depot for Mercedes Benz trucks.These trucks and vans are stored and prepared for sale after arriving in this country.
